Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 1 Hetugocchaka » 1.4 Hetusahetukaduka » 1.4.7 Pañhāvāra » 1.4.7.1 Paccayānuloma » 1.4.7.1.2 Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
Hetugocchaka
Hetusahetukaduka
Pañhāvāra
Paccayānuloma
Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
151.
421Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe nava, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi, vipāke nava, āhāre tīṇi, indriye nava, jhāne tīṇi, magge nava, sampayutte nava, atthiyā nava, natthiyā nava, vigate nava, avigate nava. (Evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
422Anulomaṃ.
<< 1.4.7.1.2 Saṅkhyāvāraup Paccanīyuddhāra >>
